crane.uploadCompletedFileDesc: Select the completed Excel file from your computer and import cranes into database.
crane.tipCraneType: Crane type must be exactly one of: Mobile Crane, Crawler Crane, Loader Crane, Tower Crane, Rotating Telehandler
crane.tipRequiredFields: Manufacturer and Model are required fields
crane.tipAutoId: Each imported crane automatically gets a unique ID (C001, C002, etc.)
crane.tipOptional: Counterweight and jib are optional - leave empty if not applicable
crane.excelMustContainDataSheet: Excel file must contain a "Data" sheet!
crane.excelMustContainCranesSheet: Excel file must contain a "Cranes" or "Crane" sheet!

shortcuts.title: User Guides
shortcuts.hintText: Shortcuts work when the extension panel is active. Select details in model, then click on extension panel and press shortcut. Some shortcuts (e.g. markups) require a detail to be selected in model.
shortcuts.alt_shift_a_desc: Colors all arrived (confirmed) but not yet installed details green, rest of model is colored white.
shortcuts.alt_shift_m_desc: Adds markups with black text and 500mm line to selected details. If details are closer than 4m, 2m height difference is used.
shortcuts.alt_shift_s_desc: Opens quick search modal and expands extension panel. Allows searching details by assembly mark from any page.
shortcuts.alt_shift_w_desc: Colors entire model white - same function as on Tools page.
shortcuts.alt_shift_b_desc: Adds bolt markups in dark blue color to selected details. If bolts are closer than 4m, 1.5m height difference is used.
shortcuts.alt_shift_i_desc: Opens Installation entry page directly, regardless of which page you are currently on.
shortcuts.alt_shift_d_desc: Adds two-line markups with vehicle code and delivery date to selected details. Each vehicle gets different color, nearby markups get different height.
shortcuts.alt_shift_r_desc: Removes all markups in model. Useful when you need to quickly delete all markups without going to Tools page.
shortcuts.alt_shift_c_desc: Colors entire model white (like ALT+SHIFT+W), but selected details in model are colored dark green. Useful for highlighting specific details.
shortcuts.alt_shift_t_desc: Opens delivery schedule and colors today's deliveries. Each vehicle gets different color (same as in delivery schedule list). If no deliveries for today, notifies you.
shortcuts.alt_shift_1_desc: Copies selected details' assembly marks in Excel format (tab-separated MARK and GUID). Suitable for pasting directly into Excel.
shortcuts.alt_shift_2_desc: Copies selected details' assembly marks as simple list (each mark on separate line). Suitable for sending via email or messenger.
shortcuts.alt_shift_3_desc: Colors all installed details dark blue, rest of model is colored white. Same logic as on Installations page.
shortcuts.alt_shift_4_desc: Selects all installed details (without coloring). Works in batches, supports large volumes (20k+ details).
